title: LFT and LFP, Aggressive silver adc main.
body:
Heyo, I have skype + ts and others, although I've left my mic at my mates place atm, I play an aggressive Kalista/Jhin in ranked and need a support who isn't going to sit back and try to tell me to just farm if we have an advantage. I understand that I can't be aggressive all the time, but when I am, I expect my support to do just that, support me. I'm happy to own up to my own mistakes and will usually blame everything that goes wrong on myself, I play a fair bit so an active group/duo would be amazing. 

Looking to get better and play with likeminded people.
